dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE countries_gb ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS uuid uuid DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(); ALTER TABLE countries_gb ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'irigoeshere'; UPDATE countries_gb SET iri = 'https://theworldavatar.io/demos/uk-base-world/Country/' || uuid;

virtualTable.name: countries_gb_geo
virtualTable.sql: SELECT ogc_fid, iri, wkb_geometry, "NAME" as name FROM countries_gb

dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE countries_ni ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS uuid uuid DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(); ALTER TABLE countries_ni ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'irigoeshere'; UPDATE countries_ni SET iri = 'https://theworldavatar.io/demos/uk-base-world/Country/' || uuid;

virtualTable.name: countries_ni_geo
virtualTable.sql: SELECT ogc_fid, iri, wkb_geometry, 'Northern Ireland' as name FROM countries_ni

dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE counties_gb ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS uuid uuid DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(); ALTER TABLE counties_gb ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'irigoeshere'; UPDATE counties_gb SET iri = 'https://theworldavatar.io/demos/uk-base-world/County/' || uuid;

virtualTable.name: counties_gb_geo
virtualTable.sql: SELECT ogc_fid, iri, wkb_geometry, "NAME" as name FROM counties_gb

dataSubsets.sql: ALTER TABLE counties_ni ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS uuid uuid DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(); ALTER TABLE counties_ni ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS iri varchar DEFAULT 'irigoeshere'; UPDATE counties_ni SET iri = 'https://theworldavatar.io/demos/uk-base-world/County/' || uuid;

virtualTable.name: counties_ni_geo
virtualTable.sql: SELECT ogc_fid, iri, wkb_geometry, "county" as name FROM counties_ni
